article_title: Another Round Of Snow Possible Tuesday Evening - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
Skies stay continue to clear Monday night and temperatures drop to the upper teens with a light northeast wind.

Tuesday will be another cold day with partly cloudy skies and highs in the low to mid-30s.

A piece of energy moves in Tuesday evening, bringing another round of snow. Snow amounts will stay low with a dusting expected in central Oklahoma and higher amounts of up to 2 inches in far northwest Oklahoma.

This chance will end early Wednesday morning.

The rest of the week ahead looks quiet but cold with highs in the upper-30s to mid-40s.
